languages.text: "Если вам будет угодно, в следующий раз я прихвачу пару вещей из допросной. Вы точно найдете им применение".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда мне надо подготовиться и взять из пыточной пару вещей. Вы точно найдете способ, как с их помощью получить еще больше наслаждения".

languages.text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."
languages.original_text: "Если вам будет угодно, в следующий раз я прихвачу пару вещей из допросной. Вы точно найдете им применение".

"If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."

languages.text: «Si complace a mi Lord Capitán, la próxima vez me traeré algunos juguetes de la sala de interrogatorios. Estoy convencida de que sabrá darles buen uso».
languages.original_text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."

traits.locale_text: «Si complace a mi Lord Capitán, la próxima vez me traeré algunos juguetes de la sala de interrogatorios. Estoy convencida de que sabrá darles buen uso».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテンがお望みなら、次回は取調室からいくつか持ってきます。きっと使い道が見つかるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテンがお望みなら、次回は取調室からいくつか持ってきます。きっと使い道が見つかるでしょう」

languages.text: “如果您愿意的话，舰长大人，我下次可以从审讯室带来些小玩具来。您一定能为它们找到合适的用途。”
languages.original_text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."

traits.locale_text: “如果您愿意的话，舰长大人，我下次可以从审讯室带来些小玩具来。您一定能为它们找到合适的用途。”

languages.text: "Wenn es dem Lord Captain recht ist, bringe ich beim nächsten Mal einige Spielzeuge aus der Verhörkammer mit. Ihr findet gewiss Verwendung dafür."
languages.original_text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es dem Lord Captain recht ist, bringe ich beim nächsten Mal einige Spielzeuge aus der Verhörkammer mit. Ihr findet gewiss Verwendung dafür."

languages.text: « Si cela vous agrée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, la prochaine fois, j'apporterai une petite sélection d'instruments en provenance de la salle d'interrogatoire. Nul doute que vous leur trouverez quelque utilité. »
languages.original_text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."

traits.locale_text: « Si cela vous agrée, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, la prochaine fois, j'apporterai une petite sélection d'instruments en provenance de la salle d'interrogatoire. Nul doute que vous leur trouverez quelque utilité. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan isterse bir dahaki sefere yanımda sorgu odasından birkaç şey getirebilirim. Kullanışlı bulacağınızı düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "If it pleases the Lord Captain, next time I will bring along a few things from the interrogation room. You will most certainly find a use for them."
